All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ApiResponse
Represents an API response with a status code and a message.
AppConfig
Configuration class for the application.
Child
Represents a child with their basic information.
DataLoadingException
Exception thrown when there is an error during data loading or processing.
DataSavingException
Exception thrown when there is an error during data saving or processing.
FirestationController
REST Controller for managing fire station data.
FirestationDTO
Represents a fire station with its address and station number.
FirestationService
Service defining the operations for managing fire stations.
GlobalExceptionHandler
Global exception handler for REST controller methods.
JsonDataFilePath
Utility class that holds the file paths to JSON data files used in the application.
JsonRepository
Repository for managing JSON data.
MedicalRecordController
REST Controller for managing medical records data.
MedicalRecordDTO
Represents medical record information for a person.
MedicalRecordInfo
Represents medical record information for a person.
MedicalRecordService
Service defining the operations for managing medical records.
PersonController
REST Controller for managing persons data.
PersonCoveredByStation
Represents information about persons covered by a fire station, including adult and child counts.
PersonDTO
Represents a person with their basic information.
PersonFloodInfo
Represents the medical records of people affected by flooding, grouped according to the address of their fire station.
PersonInfo
Represents a person with their basic information.
PersonsAndStationInfo
Represents information about a list of persons and their associated fire station.
PersonService
Service defining the operations for managing persons.
PersonsLastNameInfo
Represents a person with their basic information.
SafetynetApplication
Main application class for the Safetynet application.
SearchController
Endpoints, which enables searches This controller provides various endpoints to retrieve information about persons, their medical records, fire stations, and community-related data.
TypeOfData
Enum representing different types of data handled in the system.
